item.title: How to install Flex Builder 3 on Eclipse Galileo on Windows
item.description: Do you get an error when you try to install Flex Builder? Ignore it and carry on anyway. Edit the file: [eclipse]\links\com.adobe.flexbuilder.feature.core.link and just stick “path=” at the start so it looks something like this: path=C:/Program Files/Adobe/Flex Builder 3 Plug-in Thanks to greylurk for the original tip.
